docs.snippet: The Yankees-Pirates game on Friday night was washed away, so now the teams will play an old-fashioned, single-admission doubleheader Sunday afternoon at Yankee Stadium....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees-Pirates game on Friday night was washed away, so now the teams will play an old-fashioned, single-admission doubleheader Sunday afternoon at Yankee Stadium.
docs.abstract: Rainout will force New York Yankees and Pittsburgh Pirates to play an old-fashioned, single-admission doubleheader at Yankee Stadium; once a popular staple of baseball summers in New York, single-admission doubleheaders have declined in recent decades with teams preferring to maximize gates and revenue with two-admission, day-night doubleheaders.

headline.main: Rainout Puts Yanks in Old-Time 2-Game Set
headline.print_headline: Rainout Puts Yanks in Old-Time 2-Game Set

byline.original: By KEN PLUTNICKI and RICHARD SANDOMIR

docs.abstract: Washington Nationals beat New York Mets, 5-2, amid faltering play from Mets pitcher Jon Niese.

docs.snippet: A 1924 photograph from a Library of Congress collection shows the Yankees’ slugger in foul territory at Griffith Stadium in Washington after running into a concrete wall against the Senators....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 1924 photograph from a Library of Congress collection shows the Yankees’ slugger in foul territory at Griffith Stadium in Washington after running into a concrete wall against the Senators.
docs.abstract: The Upshot; 1924 photograph shows New York Yankees legend Babe Ruth knocked unconscious after running into wall during game against the Washington Senators; photo also offers a glimpse of baseball during nation's era of racial segregation.
